name: Treevenge
description:
Made for Ludum Dare 46.

You are camping out in the woods, when suddenly the trees come alive! The trees are angry about your campfire, and you must defend it with all your might! (and a leaf blower of course). Fuel your fire with logs from your enemies. Tip: Try attacking enemies from behind so your logs aren't launched off screen! There are 20 waves, can you beat them all?

Controls:

Left Click - Attack (Hold for charge attack)

Right Click - Suck in nearby logs, which then can be launched for more damage

WASD - Movement
